com.taobao.tmts.framework.viewelememt
类 ViewUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.taobao.tmts.framework.viewelememt.ViewUtils

public class ViewUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains view methods. Examples are getViews(), Most codes of this class are copied from com.jayway.android.robotium.solo.ViewFetcher. The original author is Renas Reda, renas.reda@jayway.com.

构造方法详细信息

ViewUtils

public ViewUtils()
方法详细信息

getTopParent

public static View getTopParent(View view)
Returns the absolute top parent View in for a given View.

参数：
view - the View whose top parent is requested
返回：
the top parent View

getListItemParent

public static View getListItemParent(View view)
Returns the list item parent. It is used by clickInList().

参数：
view - the view who's parent is requested
返回：
the parent of the view

getScrollOrListParent

public static View getScrollOrListParent(View view)
Returns the scroll or list parent view

参数：
view - the view who's parent should be returned
返回：
the parent scroll view, list view or null

getAllViews

public static java.util.ArrayList<View> getAllViews(boolean onlySufficientlyVisible)
Returns views from the shown DecorViews.

参数：
onlySufficientlyVisible - if only sufficiently visible views should be returned
返回：
all the views contained in the DecorViews

getRecentDecorView

public static final View getRecentDecorView(View[] views)
Returns the most recent DecorView

参数：
views - the views to check
返回：
the most recent DecorView

getNonDecorViews

public static final View[] getNonDecorViews(View[] views)
Returns all views that are non DecorViews

参数：
views - the views to check
返回：
the non DecorViews

getViews

public static java.util.ArrayList<View> getViews(Instrumentation inst,
                                                 View parent,
                                                 boolean onlySufficientlyVisible)
Extracts all Views located in the currently active Activity, recursively.

参数：
parent - the View whose children should be returned, or null for all
onlySufficientlyVisible - if only sufficiently visible views should be returned
返回：
all Views located in the currently active Activity, never null

addChildren

public static void addChildren(java.util.ArrayList<View> views,
                               ViewGroup viewGroup,
                               boolean onlySufficientlyVisible)
Adds all children of viewGroup (recursively) into views.

参数：
views - an ArrayList of Views
viewGroup - the ViewGroup to extract children from
onlySufficientlyVisible - if only sufficiently visible views should be returned

getView

public static <T extends View> T getView(Instrumentation inst,
                                         java.lang.Class<T> classToFilterBy,
                                         int index)
Returns a View with a certain index, from the list of current Views of the specified type.

参数：
classToFilterBy - which Views to choose from
index - choose among all instances of this type, e.g. Button.class or EditText.class
返回：
a View with a certain index, from the list of current Views of the specified type

getView

public static <T extends TextView> T getView(Instrumentation inst,
                                             java.lang.Class<T> classToFilterBy,
                                             java.lang.String text)
Returns a View that shows a given text, from the list of current Views of the specified type.

参数：
classToFilterBy - which Views to choose from
text - the text that the view shows
返回：
a View showing a given text, from the list of current Views of the specified type

getView

public static final <T extends View> T getView(Instrumentation inst,
                                               java.lang.Class<T> classToFilterBy,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<T> views,
                                               int index)
Returns a view.

参数：
classToFilterBy - the class to filter by
views - the list with views
index - the index of the view
返回：
the view with a given index

getCurrentViews

public static <T extends View> java.util.ArrayList<T> getCurrentViews(Instrumentation inst,
                                                                      java.lang.Class<T> classToFilterBy)
Returns an ArrayList of Views of the specified Class located in the current Activity.

参数：
classToFilterBy - return all instances of this class, e.g. Button.class or GridView.class
返回：
an ArrayList of Views of the specified Class located in the current Activity

getCurrentViews

public static <T extends View> java.util.ArrayList<T> getCurrentViews(Instrumentation inst,
                                                                      java.lang.Class<T> classToFilterBy,
                                                                      View parent)
Returns an ArrayList of Views of the specified Class located under the specified parent.

参数：
classToFilterBy - return all instances of this class, e.g. Button.class or GridView.class
parent - the parent View for where to start the traversal
返回：
an ArrayList of Views of the specified Class located under the specified parent

getWindowDecorViews

public static View[] getWindowDecorViews()
Returns the WindorDecorViews shown on the screen

返回：
the WindorDecorViews shown on the screen

removeInvisibleViews

public static <T extends View> java.util.ArrayList<T> removeInvisibleViews(java.util.ArrayList<T> viewList)
Removes invisible Views

参数：
viewList - an ArrayList with Views that is being checked for invisible Views.
返回：
a filtered ArrayList with no invisible Views.

filterViews

public static <T extends View> java.util.ArrayList<T> filterViews(java.lang.Class<T> classToFilterBy,
                                                                  java.util.ArrayList<View> viewList)
Filters views

参数：
classToFilterBy - the class to filter
viewList - the ArrayList to filter form
返回：
an ArrayList with filtered views
